---
format:
  html:
    code-tools: false
    include-after-body: 
      - sw-register.html
listing:
    - id: "list1"
      contents: pages/technical_writing
      sort: "date asc"
      type: custom
      categories: false
      sort-ui: false
      filter-ui: false
      feed: false
      template: listing_tech_writing.ejs
    - id: "list2"
      contents: pages/papers
      sort: "date desc"
      type: custom
      categories: false
      sort-ui: false
      filter-ui: false
      feed: false
      template: listing_papers.ejs
    - id: "list3"
      contents: pages/posts
      sort: "date desc"
      type: custom
      categories: false
      sort-ui: false
      filter-ui: false
      feed: false
      template: listing_posts.ejs

---
